node.title: Germany COVID-19 death toll passes 100,000 as fourth wave rages
node.alt: A coffin labelled with a paper 'SARS-CoV-2 positive - Corona' cremated in the crematorium in Germany.
node.description: Germany's outgoing Chancellor Angela Merkel urges her successor to impose new measures to slow the spread of the virus as the nation marks a grim milestone.
node.content:
["Germany's COVID-19 death toll has passed\u00a0100,000, with a surge in infections posing a challenge for the incoming government.", "Another 351 people died from coronavirus on Thursday, taking the total since the start of the pandemic to 100,119, according to the Robert Koch Institute.", "The number of new daily cases hit a new record of 75,961.", "\"The day on which we must mourn 100,000 victims of the coronavirus is a sad one,\" outgoing Chancellor Angela Merkel told a news conference.", "She urged her successors to act swiftly to impose further social distancing measures to break the virus's exponential growth curve.", "\"So it is crucial we make sure our hospitals don't get overburdened.\"", "The continent is at the heart of the latest\u00a0COVID-19 wave, reporting a million new infections about every two days and currently accounting for nearly two-thirds of new infections worldwide.", "The\u00a0European Commission proposed on Thursday that EU residents be required to have booster shots in order to travel to another country in the bloc without testing\u00a0or quarantining next summer.", "", "
Ms Merkel has urged the new government to swiftly implement new measures to slow the spread of coronavirus.(AP: Michael Probst)
", "
Warnings of another 100,000 deaths\u00a0in Germany\u00a0
", "Hospitals in some areas of Germany, especially in the east\u00a0and south\u00a0are under pressure\u00a0and leading virologist Christian Drosten has warned another 100,000 could die in the pandemic.", "The head of the Robert Koch Institute has put the mortality rate at about 0.8 per cent, meaning that at daily case numbers of about 50,000, some 400 people per day will end up dying.", "Germany's incoming three-party government, which announced its coalition deal on Wednesday, said it would create a team of experts that would assess the situation on a daily basis.", "Greens co-leader Annalena Baerbock said the new government, comprising the Social Democrats (SPD), Greens and Free Democrats (FDP), had set itself 10 days to decide if further restrictions were needed.", "Some, including many of Ms Merkel's conservative allies, say they should act more quickly.", "Much of Germany has already introduced rules to restrict access to indoor activities to people who have been vaccinated or have recovered from COVID-19.", "FDP leader Christian Lindner said tighter regional restrictions would probably be needed if a national lockdown\u00a0like that in neighbouring Austria\u00a0was to be avoided.", "With a vaccine rate of just 68.2 per cent, far behind some European countries such as Portugal and Spain, Chancellor-in-waiting Olaf Scholz promised to ramp up vaccinations and did not rule out making it compulsory.", "The number of people seeking vaccinations has soared in recent days, with 795,386 getting a shot on Wednesday, although the majority \u2014 626,535 \u2014 were boosters.", "", "
What COVID-19 travel insurance doesn't cover you for(Emilia Terzon)
", "Reuters/ABC"]
